articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Joe: Dems must take Trump on in the political battlefield
articles.description: The Mornng Joe panel recaps Tuesday's Democratic debate in Iowa and why Democrats have to focus on Trump rather than on one another.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Documents show Giuliani sought private meeting with Ukrainian president
articles.description: Newly released documents show that Rudy Giuliani wanted to meeting with the president of Ukraine shortly after his election. NBC News' Josh Lederman reports on how these new details could impact the impeachment case against President Trump.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Why Trump, McCarthy seem so eager to side with Bernie Sanders
articles.description: As Republican efforts to talk up Bernie Sanders pick up, at least we'll know the motivation behind them.
articles.content: As those watching the Democratic presidential race have no doubt heard, one of the most recent points of contention has to do with a 2018 conversation between Sens. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) and Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass.). At the risk of oversimplifying matters,… [+3426 chars]

articles.title: Klobuchar: I am someone who gets things done
articles.description: 2020 Democratic candidate, Sen. Amy Klobuchar, discusses the Senate impeachment trial, witnesses at the trial, Tuesday's debate in Iowa, health care reform and what her pitch is to men who voted for Trump.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Klobuchar: I am someone who gets things done
articles.description: 2020 Democratic candidate, Sen. Amy Klobuchar, discusses the Senate impeachment trial, witnesses at the trial, Tuesday's debate in Iowa, health care reform and what her pitch is to men who voted for Trump.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Polls show public opposition to Trump's confrontation with Iran
articles.description: if Trump risked a war to help his political standing, the latest polls suggest he placed a bad bet.
articles.content: Almost immediately after Donald Trump authorized an airstrike in Iraq that killed Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani, Republicans saw a political opportunity. The gambit was immediately turned into a fundraising pitch and a series of campaign ads, with GOP operati… [+2148 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Buttigieg: Trump is a symptom and cause of many of America's problems
articles.description: 2020 Democratic candidate, Pete Buttigieg, explains why he thinks the 2020 election isn't just about Trump and why he says Trump should never have come within 'cheating distance' of winning the presidency in the first place.

articles.title: Buttigieg: We can win, and we'll really have to work for it
articles.description: 2020 Democratic candidate, Pete Buttigieg, discusses support for his campaign, Tuesday's debate, his poll numbers and what a Buttigieg vs. Trump race would look like.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Amidst political turmoil, Trump focuses on toilets, washing machines
articles.description: As political turmoil swirled in D.C., and the Democratic presidential candidates debates, Donald Trump told a group of followers what was on his mind.
articles.content: Let no American news consumers say they were bored yesterday. The U.S. House leadership took steps to send articles of presidential impeachment to the U.S. Senate. Extraordinary new revelations jolted our understanding of Team Trump’s tactics in Ukraine. The … [+3058 chars]

articles.title: Joe: Dems should be discussing Trump, not a call from two...
articles.description: The Morning Joe panel recaps Wednesday's CNN/Des Moines Register Democratic debate and a tense round of exchanges between Sen. Sanders and Sen. Warren.

articles.title: Shocking new evidence released in Trump impeachment case
